Lovakite bar

Item ID13354

A lovakite bar is a bar of refined lovakite ore. This is done by using a lovakite ore and 2 pieces of coal at the Lovakite furnace in the centre of Lovakengj, granting 20 Smithing experience.

It can be smelted with a Smithing level of 45 and 30% Lovakengj favour. Smithing Tier 1 Shayzien armour yields approximately 0.136% favour per bar, while smithing Tier 5 Shayzien armour yields approximately 0.682% favour per bar.

This bar cannot be smelted in a normal furnace. If players try, it'll say it's not the right temperature. Players must use the Lovakite furnace just south of the blast mine bank (accessible instantly by using Xeric's talisman to teleport to Xeric's Inferno). However, the Superheat Item spell will work as normal.

[[File:Lovakite bar detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''lovakite bar''' is a bar of refined [[lovakite ore]]. This is done by using a [[lovakite ore]] and 2 pieces of [[coal]] at the Lovakite furnace in the centre of [[Lovakengj]], granting 20 Smithing experience.

It can be smelted with a [[Smithing]] level of 45 and 30% Lovakengj [[favour]]. Smithing [[Shayzien supply set (1)|Tier 1 Shayzien armour]] yields approximately 0.136% favour per bar, while smithing [[Shayzien supply set (5)|Tier 5 Shayzien armour]] yields approximately 0.682% favour per bar.

This bar cannot be smelted in a normal furnace. If players try, it'll say it's not the right temperature. Players must use the [[Lovakite furnace]] just south of the [[blast mine]] bank (accessible instantly by using [[Xeric's talisman]] to teleport to Xeric's Inferno). However, the [[Superheat Item]] [[spell]] will work as normal.
